CustomField.formula: (5*( FLOOR( ( Today() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( Today() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) )-(5 * ( FLOOR( ( Lead_Owner_Assignment_Date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( Lead_Owner_Assignment_Date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) )
CustomField.label: # of Business Days After Assignment
